value.0: "Sorry, I'm on a break now."
The bard puffs himself up and then starts to sing. "Doom, doom, doom, doom. Doom, doom, doom, doom!"
"Well, it works for some bards."
The bard begins a new song. "He is astounding, time is slowing, the mage is... on a roll."
"You watch closely, the enemy stops moving, your mage is... in full control."
"Do you remember... casting the time stop... killing those helpless pawns."
"They died so... so very easily... let's cast time stop again! Let's cast time stop again!"
"It's just a basilisk's crest... and then the wings of a sprite... wave your wand o'er your chest... and say the words just right..."
"But it's the demon's curse... that really makes it such a pain... let's cast time stop again. Let's cast time stop again."
"Bloody tough crowd in here."
"Thank you. Don't applaud, just throw gold."
The bard looks startled. "Why thank you. Now that's a rarity!"
He nods and winks at you.
The bard begins to sing. "Come on mage, why don't you cast your spell... with all your class."
"I'm gonna pull my sword, and knock those monsters down... with all my class."
"Mount up on your horse, I know a hunting spot, where the undead are cold, but the hellhounds are hot."
"It's just a dungeon crawl, where there's a nightly brawl, with all... that... class."
"Blacken your face and wear your magic shoes... and all that class."
"I think our cleric here is going to heal our blues... and all that class."
"Hold on friend, I'm going to need some hugs, I bought a magic cape that drives away those bugs..."
"While through the swamp we crawl until we kill them all, to prove our... class." The bard stops singing, waiting expectantly.
He grumbles to himself and starts tuning his lyre.
"Thank you, I'll be here for the whole invasion."
<StartAction>[Walk away.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Keep listening.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Clap politely.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Applaud loudly.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Give 5 gold.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Laugh.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Walk away.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Keep listening.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Clap politely.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Applaud loudly.]</Start>
